words.prompt: ____________ are groups of people chosen to do certain work.
A ____________ is a meeting for a specific purpose.
____________ means “to argue or discuss.”
A ____________ is a plan or suggestion.
A ____________ is formed by joining two or more people or things together.
When you ____________ something, you make a choice about how to solve a problem.
A ____________ is a condition or state of affairs.
____________ are people chosen to speak or act for others.
When you are ____________ , you are making someone feel certain or sure about something.
If you ____________ the smell of smoke, you discovered it or noticed it.
If something is ____________ , it is coming into view and can be seen.
____________ is a feeling of thankfulness.
____________ is leadership or direction.
An ____________ is a result or consequence.
____________ means “before or earlier.”
A ____________ is a chase.
If you are ____________ , you have a strong desire to succeed at something.
If you ____________ something, you learned it by heart.
____________ is feeling pleased when you accomplish something.
If you ____________ , you shook or trembled from fear or cold.
____________ poems do not have rhyme.
A ____________ poem is a poem that tells a story.
____________ is the repeating of words, phrases, or lines in a poem.
A poem with ____________ has lines that end with the same sound.
